item.description:
Mansfield Freeman Center of East Asian Studies,

Wesleyan University, Middletown

Sunday, November 6, 2011 – 1 – 5 p.m.

 

The Buddhist Faith Fellowship invites everyone to its first Craft Festival on Sunday, Nov. 6, from 1 – 5 p.m. at the Mansfield Freeman Center for East Asian Studies, 343 Washington Terrace, Wesleyan University, Middletown Ct.

 

The Festival will feature unique Asian themed crafts, altars, jewelry, animal balloons, knit items, candles, books and cds, and Christmas/holiday items. In a joyful atmosphere of music, food, and games, come and experience mini reiki and mini reflexology sessions, meditation lessons, writing haiku poetry and testing your meditative powers with the Mind Flex game. Children are welcome. Admission is free.


Visit www.bffct.net for directions and more details.
item.how_to_find_us: 343 Washington Terrace, Wesleyan University, Middletown Ct.
item.name: Buddhist Craft Festival
